title: Kodak Zi6 HD Pocket Video Camera
description: Become an instant celebrity or paparazzi with the Kodak Zi6 pocket video camera. Just hit record to capture the action, adventure and all the juicy details in stunning HD quality video. Make your cinematic debut on any HDTV. Or just pop the USB in the nearest PC and you're ready to share the fun on YouTube.Edit, add music and personalize your flick and then easily share with your adoring fans. There/s no such thing as "you should've been there" with the Zi6.
